message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only willing to pay up to $10000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your honesty. However, I was really hoping to get a better price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $11000. Is that something you'd be comfortable with?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still not able to go above $10000 for the product. Would you be open to meeting me at this price?
